channel.title: ~Clan Wars Help~
channel.description:
Okay, I'm making a custom Clan Wars, but this isnt a shitty remake of Castle Wars, it's a better version... So think of it as Clan Wars 2.0 or some other version. So here is what I have so far...
-I have a new Clan Wars arena (Its the lava maze only it's blocked off) -I have the portals that take you to the seperate areas such as Clan A portal and Clan B portal (They are in Home area) -I have flags that are at the seperate portals (But the other team does NOT take the flag, it's just there to show you which clan area it is) -I have obsticales for archers and mages
...okay, so whats the problem you might ask. Well, first off I need...
-A game "interface" I guess you could call it -A way to start the game -A time limit -A scoring system -A Clan system (A way for the game to recognize Clans and give them points for kills) -Someone that will actually help me with this...
Thanks, - 00ryn00 (Mimz)

item.title: ~Clan Wars Help~
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

lol ry,
if I could do this on my own, I wouldn’t be asking for help now would I?
and foolet… well I wouldnt call myself noobish, because I’ve added some cool stuff to my server but I’m definantly not on a moderate level either… so I’m kinda in the middle of Noob and Allright…

Read full topic

item.title: ~Clan Wars Help~
item.dc:creator: @Mosh_On Mosh_On
item.description:
@Mosh_On wrote:

If you are using a ZDR base it as a Zam,Guth,Sara kill point system integrated. if you dont just download zdr and rip it off the source onto yours.

Read full topic

item.title: ~Clan Wars Help~
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

Okay, I’m making a custom Clan Wars, but this isnt a shitty remake of Castle Wars, it’s a better version… So think of it as Clan Wars 2.0 or some other version.
So here is what I have so far…

-I have a new Clan Wars arena (Its the lava maze only it’s blocked off)
-I have the portals that take you to the seperate areas such as Clan A portal and Clan B portal (They are in Home area)
-I have flags that are at the seperate portals (But the other team does NOT take the flag, it’s just there to show you which clan area it is)
-I have obsticales for archers and mages

…okay, so whats the problem you might ask. Well, first off I need…

-A game “interface” I guess you could call it
-A way to start the game
-A time limit
-A scoring system
-A Clan system (A way for the game to recognize Clans and give them points for kills)
-Someone that will actually help me with this…

Thanks,

  • 00ryn00 (Mimz)

Read full topic
